title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: There's been a further breakdown in bipartisanship on foreign policy with Labor accusing the Prime Minister of putting politics ahead of the national interest. In a major speech in Canberra on Monday, Shadow Foreign Affairs Minister Penny Wong warned of increasing populism under Scott Morrison's approach. She also accused the government of having "lightweight" ideas which fail to address the rise of China. Senator Wong went on to accuse the Prime Minister of fumbling Australia's relationship with China. Image: News Corp Australia
